alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 5:14PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN CHEYENNE...KIMBALL AND EASTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 413 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Brownson to 6 miles west of Oliver Campground...and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 25 mph and visibilities less than one mile. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Kimball, Potter, Dix, Colton, Oliver Campground, Brownson, Oliver Reservoir, Kimball Airport and Bushnell. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 3 and 59. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!
